Subject: Verbio Dataset Error

 

Hello,

 

I hope that this message finds you well.

 

Today the Verbio dataset seems to have an extraction issue, even though it appears at a first glance the source file sent by email has not changed.

 

Could you please investigate this?

 

https://verbio.dnext.io/datasets/verbio-biof-eur-cash-daily/usages

 



 

Thank you in advance for your help.

 

Best,

 

Enea
